name: pugna_move_07
text: I'll take a crack at it.

name: pugna_move_12
text: I was headed that way myself.

name: pugna_purch_02
text: Not a bad price for making my enemies weep.
text_simple: not a bad price for making my enemies weep

name: pugna_rare_01
text: All sorceries have their source in the Nether Reaches.
text_simple: all sorceries have their source in the nether reaches

name: pugna_rare_02
text: Do you know why they call it the Nether Reaches? Because it reaches into you.
text_simple: do you know why they call it the nether reaches because it reaches into you

name: pugna_rare_03
text: As bad as things get, I can always come up with a way to make them a little worse.
text_simple: as bad as things get i can always come up with a way to make them a little worse

name: pugna_rare_04
text: To master oblivion, you must become oblivion. Look into my eyes and you will see what I'm talking about.
text_simple: to master oblivion you must become oblivion look into my eyes and you will see what im talking about

name: pugna_respawn_01
text: I was just looking in on the Nether Reaches.
text_simple: i was just looking in on the nether reaches

name: pugna_respawn_05
text: Ah, expelled from the Nether Reaches.
text_simple: ah expelled from the nether reaches

name: pugna_respawn_06
text: A new age of dark magic starts now.
text_simple: a new age of dark magic starts now

name: pugna_respawn_07
text: I renew my vows to cause the most possible suffering.
text_simple: i renew my vows to cause the most possible suffering

name: pugna_respawn_08
text: It's not like you're going to get anywhere without me.
text_simple: its not like youre going to get anywhere without me

name: pugna_respawn_09
text: Ah, let's see if I can make the worst of a bad situation.
text_simple: ah lets see if i can make the worst of a bad situation

name: pugna_respawn_10
text: I'm back, and I've got a few ideas for some new headstones.
text_simple: im back and ive got a few ideas for some new headstones

name: pugna_respawn_11
text: Ah, I'm not sure what happened back there, but I'm not going to let it happen again.
text_simple: ah im not sure what happened back there but im not going to let it happen again

name: pugna_rival_02
text: Viper! I wondered where you had gotten to.
text_simple: viper i wondered where you had gotten to

name: pugna_rival_03
text: What was it, Viper? Nether Reaches lost their charm?
text_simple: what was it viper nether reaches lost their charm

name: pugna_rival_04
text: Back to the Nether Reaches with you, Viper!
text_simple: back to the nether reaches with you viper

name: pugna_rival_05
text: Viper, here you fly where below you crawled.
text_simple: viper here you fly where below you crawled

name: pugna_rival_08
text: Anti-Mage, it's like looking in a broken mirror.
text_simple: antimage its like looking in a broken mirror

name: pugna_rival_09
text: The real enigma is why you thought you could go up against me.
text_simple: the real enigma is why you thought you could go up against me

name: pugna_rival_10
text: Shadow Shaman, I cast you out.
text_simple: shadow shaman i cast you out

name: pugna_scepter_02
text: I hereby banish any need for patience.
text_simple: i hereby banish any need for patience

name: pugna_spawn_02
text: I'll take all you have and more.
text_simple: ill take all you have and more

name: pugna_spawn_05
text: I channel the power of the Nether Reaches.
text_simple: i channel the power of the nether reaches

name: pugna_win_03
text: Let Oblivion ring with Pugna's endless victories!
text_simple: let oblivion ring with pugnas endless victories
